title: Toufoubox
fullDescription: An innovative mobile application combining augmented reality with gaming elements to create an engaging user experience.
businessValue: Enhanced user engagement through cutting-edge AR technology, driving increased retention and user satisfaction.

title: Bardo Museum AR Experience
description: Digital transformation for Tunisia's premier cultural institution
fullDescription: Developed the 'Bardo UP' augmented reality application for Tunisia's National Bardo Museum, one of the most important museums in the Mediterranean region.
businessValue: Enhanced visitor experience for 500,000+ annual visitors

title: Teleport Hand Tracking System
description: Next-generation gesture recognition platform for seamless interaction
fullDescription: Teleport represents the future of human-computer interaction through advanced hand tracking and gesture recognition technology. This innovative platform enables touchless interface solutions for post-pandemic world.
businessValue: Touchless interface solutions for post-pandemic world

title: Blockchain Gaming Ecosystem
description: Web3 gaming platform driving new revenue models
fullDescription: Pioneered a comprehensive blockchain gaming ecosystem that combines traditional gaming mechanics with Web3 technologies to create new revenue opportunities for players and developers.
businessValue: Revolutionary gaming economics with player ownership and new monetization models
